titleStmt.title: King David's deliverance, and thanksgiving applied to the case of our King and nation, in two sermons, the one preached on the second, the other on the ninth of September, 1683 / by John Cave ...
titleStmt.author: Cave, John, d. 1690.

notesStmt.note: "An Eucharistical ode to God our Deliverer": p. 59-63.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
